# MTLArrayType

**Class**

A description of an array.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLArrayType
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArrayType] instance provides details about an array parameter. Don’t create [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArrayType] instances directly; other reflection instances contain properties to determine if a parameter is an array and to obtain the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArrayType] instance that describes the array.

## Describing the array elements

- **arrayLength**: The number of elements in the array.
- **elementType**: The data type of the array’s elements.
- **stride**: The stride between array elements, in bytes.
- **argumentIndexStride**: The stride, in bytes, between argument indices.

## Obtaining details for complex array elements

- **element()**: Provides a description of the underlying type when an array holds other arrays as its elements.
- **elementStructType()**: Provides a description of the underlying struct type when an array holds structs as its elements.
- **elementPointerType()**: Provides a description of the underlying pointer type when an array holds pointers as its elements.
- **elementTextureReferenceType()**: Provides a description of the underlying texture type when an array holds textures as its elements.

## Instance Methods

- **elementTensorReferenceType()**: Provides a description of the underlying tensor type when this array holds tensors as its elements.

## Shader types

- **MTLType**: A description of a data type.
- **MTLDataType**: The types of GPU functions, including shaders and compute kernels.
- **MTLStructType**: A description of a structure.
- **MTLStructMember**: An instance that provides information about a field in a structure.
- **MTLPointerType**: A description of a pointer.
- **MTLTextureReferenceType**: A description of a texture.

## Inherits From

- MTLType

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
